sources.title: Mutiny at Fort Sharpe (1966) with Broderick Crawford | Spaghetti Western | Italiano
sources.description:
French soldiers accidentally cross over from Mexico into the US. In doing so they rescue a woman from an Indian raid and take her to Fort Sharp. After they arrive the fort is besieged by Indians. The French and American troops have to fight side by side under the orders of an unstable commander.

Director: Fernando Cerchio
Writers: Jesús Navarro Carrión, Ugo Liberatore, Fernando Cerchio
Release date: January 9, 1966 (Italy)

Main Actors:
Broderick Crawford - Colonel Lenox
Elisa Montés - Brenda
Mario Valdemarin - Captain Clermont
Ugo Sasso - Sgt. Ross
José Marco - cabo Brandy
Umberto Ceriani - Southern Medical Lieutenant


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
12:52 Captain Clermont reveals the dire situation as his men are trapped between hostile Navajo and Southern forces.
24:16 Colonel Lennox takes the French prisoners into Fort Sharpe, setting the stage for uneasy alliances.
35:26 Sergeant Ross brings news of the massacre, shattering hope for the soldiers’ families.
43:09 Brenda pleads with Captain Clermont to help her escape, forging a bond amid chaos.
63:02 Sergeant Ross and the grieving soldiers confront Colonel Lennox, demanding to bury their loved ones.
78:13 Lieutenant Foster defies orders to bury the dead, sparking open mutiny within the fort.
85:41 Colonel Lennox leads a desperate defense as Wichita and thousands of Navajo warriors launch their final assault.


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdaYxUUeZrLnntVqlM4qijQM


 @CultCinemaClassics
